title: Competition: Win P-Money and Sukh Knight Ticket
body:
So did you hear about Robbie getting back with Take That? How about you grow a pair, stop living in the 90’s and enter yet another fabulous _Crack In The Road_ competition.

A potential phoenix from the Method ashes, excuse the provincialism non Prestonians, **Fuse** could well become the next epicentre to those who worship in the dark art of dub infused delirium. Up and coming Dubstep phenomenon **Sukh Knight**, as reviewed at World Headquarters by my esteemed compatriot Joel, has teamed up with Grime guru **P-Money** to totally obliterate Lava in Preston on Friday 6th August.

**P- Money**, renowned for his ‘beefin’ with **Ghetts,** as well as his lyrical prowess on the **Tim Westwood Radio 1 show**, has collaborated astutely with the block rockin’ beats of **Knight**, to produce tunes such as _‘Slang’_ and _‘Left the room’_. This pairing has received regular airplay on _Radio 1Xtra_ and is creating quite a stir amongst the underground circles.

For the opportunity to obtain two free tickets to this event, all you must do is send an E-mail to samheaney2009@live.co.uk simply stating ‘I want free tickets’. The competition will end at midday on 4th August and the winner will be announced within an hour of the competition closing.
